snippet: Will Walker, a student at University School in Hunting Valley, Ohio, doesn't feel like "lightning struck" at any of the colleges he visited. But he's chosen to submit a binding early decision application anyway.
abstract: Will Walker, a student at University School in Hunting Valley, Ohio, doesn't feel like "lightning struck" at any of the colleges he visited. But he's chosen to submit a binding early decision application anyway.

headline.main: A Fast Shopper Chooses His College Early, but With Reservations
